data.text: @StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML The military isn’t exempt because military readiness has been determined to trump, no pun intended, personal freedom because military readiness is more important. Been that way since Washington.
@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML The government is the largest employer in the country.
@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML That is why measles has come back from the brink of irradiation.

@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML I was born in the 70s and I have 3 kids. All had to meet vaccine mandates before attending school. Exemptions were extremely rare when I was young. Only in recent times have widespread exemptions been a thing.
@ishooku @HWoodbery @thedragonLML You seriously count that? Please. That was all political. What’s the % of govt employees vs the rest of the country? Again, political. It’s all been political

@ishooku @HWoodbery @thedragonLML Vax hesitancy is not a new thing. Maybe in your world, but not everyone’s world. None of my children were vax after my first had a severe, almost deadly reaction. No, she has never been vax. You can get exemptions in Texas…at least until CV (for hospital)
@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML They allowed people that worked in government jobs that were not health related to not get vaccinated. So yeah it did

@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML No polio vaccine? No MMR vaccine? Vaccine hesitancy is a new thing. As a society we have never had this before. I doubt that she has never had a vaccine. Every school student is required to meet vaccine mandates.
@ishooku @HWoodbery @thedragonLML What the SC has done or not done is irrelevant. Their rulings changed nothing

@StephReid17 @HWoodbery @thedragonLML I wouldn’t say he is to blame, but he has skin in the game. He controls a great deal of research budgets so he gets more money if he can perpetuate his narrative. He wouldn’t have that power if media was actually objective.
